gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Spurs 135, Hornets 99
gameRecap.excerpt: The Spurs defeated the Hornets, 135-99. Victor Wembanyama led the way for the Spurs with 26 points and 11 rebounds, while Doug McDermott added 14 points and four 3PM in the victory. LaMelo Ball tallied a game-high 28 points, along with five assists and a career-high tying five steals for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Spurs have won back-to-back games as they improve to 7-30 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 8-28.
